text: Henry Charles "Hank" Stackpole III (May 7, 1935 - May 29, 2020) was an American lieutenant general in the Marine Corps.Nominations before the Senate Armed Services Committee, second session, 102d ... - United States. Congress. Senate. Committee on Armed Services - Google Books His awards include the Silver Star, Legion of Merit, and Defense Superior Service Medal. He entered the Marine Corps in 1957. He was born in New Haven, Connecticut.Not Ready to Meet His Creator â€“ Lt. General H. C. (Hank) Stackpole III, U.S. Marine Corps, retired | Hawaii Reporter Stackpole died in Hawaii on May 29, 2020 at the age of 85.Warrior-statesman retired Marine Corps Lt. Gen. title: H. C. Stackpole III
